entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9627] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests with a value of 15,000,000 reported in the network role http://basfse.com/xbrl/2020/roles/GewinnVerlust should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of -15,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://basfse.com/xbrl/2020/roles/Eigenkapitalveraenderungsrechnung. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests : -6 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -6 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900PM64WH8AF1E917/2020-12-31/ESEF/DE/0/basf-gruppe-2020-12-31.zip/basf-gruppe-2020-12-31/reports/basf-gruppe-2020-12-31.xhtml 16954

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9627] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests with a value of -70,000,000 reported in the network role http://basfse.com/xbrl/2020/roles/GewinnVerlust should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of 70,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://basfse.com/xbrl/2020/roles/Eigenkapitalveraenderungsrechnung. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests fact are:
Period : 2019-01-01 to 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests : -6 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -6 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900PM64WH8AF1E917/2020-12-31/ESEF/DE/0/basf-gruppe-2020-12-31.zip/basf-gruppe-2020-12-31/reports/basf-gruppe-2020-12-31.xhtml 16954
